description: This notification will be generated when the IP address of interface
is changed. The change maybe originate from NMS, DHCP server or
This notification announces useful IP address change. So it
is triggered by significative IP address change.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HPN-ICF-IP-ADDRESS-MIB::hpnicfIpAddressChangeNotify HPN-ICF-IP-ADDRESS-MIB::hpnicfIpAddrNotifyIfIndex i 9999 HPN-ICF-IP-ADDRESS-MIB::hpnicfIpAddrOldIpAddress s EXAMPLE HPN-ICF-IP-ADDRESS-MIB::hpnicfIpAddrNewIpAddress s EXAMPLE HPN-ICF-IP-ADDRESS-MIB::hpnicfIpAddrFirstTrapTime t 31536000

description: The IP address IfIndex of specified interface on the device.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-IP-ADDRESS-MIB::hpnicfIpAddrNotifyIfIndex

description: The Old IP address of specified interface on the device.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-IP-ADDRESS-MIB::hpnicfIpAddrOldIpAddress

description: The New IP address of specified interface on the device.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-IP-ADDRESS-MIB::hpnicfIpAddrNewIpAddress
